>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
>>> rng = np.random.default_rng()
>>> t = np.arange(400)

>>> n[40:60] = np.exp(1j*rng.uniform(0, 2*np.pi, (20,)))

>>> plt.plot(t, s.real, 'b-', t, s.imag, 'r--')
